About Us

At Allport Logistics & Haulage Services International

At Allport Logistics and Haulage Services International Limited (ALHS), we offer warehousing facilities and haulage services all over Nigeria truly satisfying our clients through our seamless mode of operation in importing and exporting globally. Whether you are new to, or experienced in international trade, ALHS offers a myriad of cargo transportation and value-added logistics services, ranging from customs clearance to assistance with regulatory compliance issues. ALHS specializes in expediting your cargo through the supply chain globally via any of the many air, ocean or land entry points. Our experienced team can walk you through every step of the import and export process and will help you clear your cargo fast, 24 hours a day – 7 days a week, while mitigating risk of penalties or delays. Above all, We partner with shipping and airlines thereby making our services rate the best among equals. ALHS is currently at the verge of acquiring a bonded container terminal with the ability to take up to two vessel’s at a time.

Allport Logistics and Haulage International Limited is a fully registered Customs Licensed Clearing and forwarding Company situated in Lagos, Nigeria. As a clearing agent in Lagos Nigeria, our Directors and Members of Staff have a shipping industry experience for more than 20 years, we have handled jobs for different clients from small start-ups to big corporations. As clearing agents, we operate in any port (Sea port & Air port). We have a formidable team of individuals fully passionate about the business and are committed to delivering consignments on time. We facilitate clearance from Nigeria Customs for a lot of items such as: Machinery, Artificial resins (HDPE, LDPE etc), Talc powder, Odoriferous substances, Petroleum Jelly,non-woven tissue, paper core, BOPP, Pumps,Fluff pulp, vehicles, Tyres, electronics & lots more.

Warehousing Facilities

ALHS offer warehousing facilities to its clients. We solicit on behalf of Importers to handle shipping requirements from the beginning to the end such as opening of form ‘M’, PAAR processing etc.

Haulage services

ALHS offer haulage services all over Nigeria. We have the capacity to handle all your haulage needs. Let us deliver your goods to your warehouse or any destination proposed.

Clearing of Goods

ALHS as a Clearing Agent in Lagos, we offer services from Customs broking, documentations for our clients to facilitate the clearing of goods from either the air or sea port in record time.
